heading: HJR0011
0: JOINT RESOLUTION AUTHORIZING THE NATIONAL HOUSING AUTHORITY TO AWARD THE UNOCCUPIED AND UNAWARDED AFP/PNP/BFP/BJMP/BUCOR HOUSING UNITS TO OTHER QUALIFIED BENEFICIARIES
mother-bill statusstatus: Republic Act JR00002 enacted on 2018-05-09 Substituted by HJR0015
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HJR0011
FULL TITLE : JOINT RESOLUTION AUTHORIZING THE NATIONAL HOUSING AUTHORITY TO AWARD THE UNOCCUPIED AND UNAWARDED AFP/PNP/BFP/BJMP/BUCOR HOUSING UNITS TO OTHER QUALIFIED BENEFICIARIES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BENITEZ, ALFREDO "ALBEE" B.
DATE FILED : 2017-04-06
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2017-05-30
      2. Under deliberation by the Mother Committee on 2017-08-23
          -Substitute Bill Approved by the Committee
      3. Fact Sheet prepared on 2017-09-11
      4. Draft of Substitute/Amended/Consolidated Measure prepared on 2017-09-11
      5. Draft of Committee Report and Attachments/Inquiries/Impeachment/Ethics Complaint prepared on 2017-09
      6. Transmittal memo prepared on 2017-09-11
      7. Committee Report filed on 2017-09-16
          -Committee Report No. 386 on House Joint Resolution No. 15
      8. Committee Report Signed by the Chairperson on 2017-09-18
      9. Prepared and Transmitted the required copies of Committee Report on 2017-09-18
      10. Committee Report filed on 2017-09-19
          --Committee Report No. 386 on House Joint Resolution No. 15 was filed on 2017-09-19 but was erroneously reported as filed on 2017-09-16
      11. Referred the Committee Report to the Committee on Rules (OB) on 2017-09-26
          --Approved on Second Reading (2017-09-26); -Approved on Third Reading (2017-10-04); -House Adopted Senate Bill (SJR No. 008) as amendment to House Bill (2018-01-17); -Transmitted to and received by the Senate (2018-01-22); -Transmitted to the Office of the President for Signature (2018-02-26); -Signed by the President as Joint Resolution No. 02 (2018-05-09)
      12. Approved for Inclusion in the Calendar of Business on 2017-09-26
MOTHER BILL: HJR0015
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT ON 2017-05-02
